name: Seedbuzz
tag_list: vegetable-seedling-machinery, agriculture, it-services, recruitment, market-research, seed
overview:
Seedbuzz.com is a comprehensive web portal, which has been designed as a single window stop shop for all enquires on seeds.Seedbuzz offer a vast source of database and customized product offerings for all the stakeholders of the seed industry.It aims to create a network for seed industry and related industries by acting as a convenient bridge between the buyers and sellers. It provides intense research based information for our clients to better drive and enhance their business efficiency. It also enable sales and discussion through forums open to different topics on Seedbuzz. It can give you an edge in the seed industry by providing a multitude of IT services including web solutions to your business.

Seedbuzz is a brand under the company “N Buzz Business Solution Private Limited”. The company was incorporated in 2011 under the companies’ act 1956 as N Buzz Business Solution Private Limited. The company deals in business of online classifications, review websites, online trading and end-to-end solutions.

Some of the services provided by seedbuzz include:

Customized Market research – Country/Region/Crop specific customized studies. Specific crop research – Genetic resources/ access to public germplasm Recruitment services Legal consultation on cross border movement of seed/ PVP and registration – Official catalogs from 170 Embassies IT web Solutions – ERP/BPM Discussion forums- Market trends, research in product development, new upgrades and technologies.

products.name: Customized Market research – Country/Region/Crop specific customized studies

offices.address1: No.7, 3rd Cross, ‘B’ Street, Link Road,   Malleshwaram East Link
